ContestPage.title: Contests
ContestPage.description: Explore our diverse range of academic contests designed to ignite brilliance across every grade level.

NoorQuest.name: NoorQuest
NoorQuest.shortDesc: Test your Qur'anic wisdom with NoorQuest.
NoorQuest.fullDesc: NoorQuest is a spiritually enriching contest designed to test students' knowledge of the Qur'an, including memorization, comprehension, and key themes.

CodeNova.name: CodeNova
CodeNova.fullDesc: CodeNova challenges students with age-appropriate logical, computational, and programming-based problems, promoting digital fluency.

NuminaX.name: NuminaX
NuminaX.fullDesc: A mathematics contest designed to challenge critical thinking, logic, and arithmetic fluency across various age levels.

NovaMind.name: NovaMind
NovaMind.fullDesc: NovaMind is a science contest that tests observation, hypothesis building, and analytical thinking in real-world scenarios.

InkspireChronicles.name: Inkspire Chronicles
InkspireChronicles.fullDesc: A creative writing contest inviting students to express themselves through stories, essays, and imaginative prose.
InkspireChronicles.format: Submit original writing based on prompt

VisionVerse.name: VisionVerse
VisionVerse.shortDesc: Paint your vision, shape your verse.
VisionVerse.fullDesc: VisionVerse invites students to express creativity through visual art, exploring themes of innovation, nature, and culture.

QuickIntro.title: About AAZ Nextgen
QuickIntro.intro: We're where innovation meets education, designed to spark curiosity and empower learners through technology-enhanced experiences.
QuickIntro.mission: At AAZ Nextgen, our mission is to ignite intellectual curiosity and elevate potential by providing a dynamic, technology-driven educational platform. We aim to challenge and nurture learners of all ages through innovative assessments, engaging content, and purposeful academic support, ensuring every learner grows with confidence, clarity, and competence.
QuickIntro.vision: To become a globally trusted hub of academic distinction—where technology meets pedagogy, where testing becomes transformation, and where every learner is inspired to achieve mastery beyond limits.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to common queries about our testing services

questions.1: How do I check my test results?
questions.2: What documents do I need for registration?
questions.3: How long does it take to receive results?
questions.4: Can I retake the test if I'm not satisfied?
questions.5: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.6: How can I verify my test results?

answers.1: Results are available in your student portal 24 hours after test completion. You'll also receive an SMS notification.
answers.2: You need a scanned copy of your CNIC/B-Form and a recent passport-sized photograph in digital format.
answers.3: Most results are processed within 24 hours. During peak seasons, it may take up to 48 hours.
answers.4: Yes, you can retake the test after 30 days. Please check the retake policy in our downloads section.
answers.5: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and JazzCash/EasyPaisa mobile payments.
answers.6: All results include a unique verification code that can be checked on our website.

AboutPage.whoWeAreContent: At AAZ Nextgen, we believe that education should not only inform—but inspire. Guided by our tagline, Fueling Ambition Through Modern Learning, we are a next-generation educational platform committed to empowering learners through innovation, challenge, and personalized growth. Whether you're a student seeking to test your knowledge or a lifelong learner aiming for intellectual excellence, AAZ Nextgen offers dynamic, technology-enhanced tools and assessments tailored to diverse needs and age groups. Rooted in a mission to ignite curiosity and elevate potential, and driven by a vision to become a globally trusted hub of academic distinction, AAZ Nextgen is where passion meets progress—and futures are built.
